Data: India has won the toss and elected to bowl first, because the pitch has been under cover for some time and there might be something for the bowlers early on, says MS Dhoni.
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run first ball pitches on a length and is on the stumps, on target straight away. Defended by the batsman.
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run slightly straighter this time, Finch pushes it to the on side, but there's no run
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs hint of swing, but that one is wide and full and Finch launches that one over mid on and there's no stopping that one
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run length on the stumps again, Finch pushes it to the now-vacant mid on and takes an easy single
Bhuvneshwar to Maddinson, no run fullish ball well wide of Maddinson, who tries to cut but misses

Bhuvneshwar to Maddinson, FOUR runs first international runs for Maddinson, and that is a decent stroke. Full, pitching just on off stump. Maddinson gets a stride in and drives it straight back past the non-striker's stumps to collect the second four of the over
Vinay to Finch, 1 run
Vinay to Maddinson, no run length ball angled across, a little bit of shape there, and Maddinson pokes and misses

Vinay to Maddinson, FOUR runs but now Maddinson gets his second boundary. The full balls have disappeared so far and this is no different. Overpitched outside off stump, Maddinson gets the lofted off drive out and sends it to the long off fence
Vinay to Maddinson, FOUR runs fine start this. Opened the face on yet another fullish delivery. This one was wider, so it was carved behind square on the off side, aerially
Vinay to Maddinson, 1 run length ball closer into the stumps, Maddinson pushes that into the infield and scampers through
Vinay to Finch, no run length ball on off stump, defended into the off side
Ashwin to Maddinson, FOUR runs no fear there. Maddinson charges Ashwin's first ball and lofts it over extra cover for a boundary
Ashwin to Maddinson, 1 run length ball on the stumps, straightening, pushed into the infield and a comfortable single ensues
Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs neither spin or seam working here. Finch backs away, gets far enough from the length ball and cuts it in the gap behind square for four
Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs another back-away, but this time the ball is fuller and he hits this one through cover
Ashwin to Finch, no run makes room again, but Ashwin goes closer to the batsman and he hits it straight to cover

Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs mayhem early on here. Finch hasn't backed away this time, and Ashwin bowls it full and wide. Batsman gets low and carves it over cover-point and it almost gets to the fence on the full
Sharma to Maddinson, SIX runs how good does this kid look? That wasn't even that short there, and he has sat back and pulled Ishant Sharma way into the stands. What a blow.
Sharma to Maddinson, FOUR runs India are rattled! This one is shorter, swivel pulls that neatly and powerfully past square leg for another four
Sharma to Maddinson, no run length on the stumps, defended into the off side
Sharma to Maddinson, no run bowls wide of the crease, length ball angled into the stumps, defended square on the off side and there's no run
Sharma to Maddinson, 1 run shorter and slightly outside off stump, turned away nicely to third man, who runs around to collect
Sharma to Finch, 1 run length ball on the stumps, Finch moves across and clips it into a gap on the legside
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 wide full and way down the leg side
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run legside again, full and on the pads, but Finch finds the fine-leg fielder with his flick
Bhuvneshwar to Maddinson, 1 run length ball outside off stump, Maddinson comes down the pitch and slogs across the line, but he gets an under edge and it goes to deep midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run fullish on off stump, driven to long on.
Bhuvneshwar to Maddinson, FOUR runs and as soon as I say that, Nic Maddinson backs away and carves a full, wide delivery over backward point for another boundary

Bhuvneshwar to Maddinson, OUT gone! Bit of inexperience there you have to think. He was batting so well, playing decent shots, but he goes for an ungainly swipe across the line, and Kumar comes in from around the wicket to angle one in. Maddinson misses, Bhuvneshwar hits the top of off stump and sends the wicket flying. Promising first innings though.

Bhuvneshwar to Watson, FOUR runs misfield gives up a four. It was a wide length ball from Bhuvneshwar and Watson played it late. Ishant Sharma at short third man should have stopped it, but he only gets a hand to it and carries on to the boundary
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs short, wide and struck powerfully past a diving backward point to the boundary.

Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs another boundary off a misfield, almost identical, but Ashwin is the culprit this time. Short, but not as wide as the last delivery, Finch plays it late and Ashwin can't collect at short third man. Slips through for four
Sharma to Finch, no run closer into the body, Finch chops down on it, no run
Sharma to Finch, 1 run full and on the stumps, driven along the ground to long on
Sharma to Watson, 1 run length ball on off stump, defended into the legside and there's time for a run
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs slower ball, full toss outside off stump, driven nicely past a diving mid off for four
Jadeja to Watson, no run full and flighted, turning away from off stump, Watson has a swing but it turns away from the blade and he misses
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run full but closer into the stumps, drives it to deep cover this time
Jadeja to Finch, no run short ball close into the stumps, Finch misses with a cut
Jadeja to Finch, SIX runs shortish and wide, and Finch absolutely lays into this, backing away to loft it over deep cover for six
Jadeja to Finch, no run short, fast and wide, Finch makes room again and misses, temporarily losing his balance
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run full toss on the legs, driven along the ground to wide long on
Vinay to Finch, 1 run shortish and wide, cut away to the fielder but there's enough time for one
Vinay to Watson, 1 wide full and that will be a wide down the leg side
Vinay to Watson, OUT jagged back in sharply, off a length and it misses Watson's big off drive. Hits him on the back pad and he has to go. Very good ball
Vinay to Bailey, no run that was fullish and down the legside as well, but it must have collected pad on the way through, no wide
Vinay to Bailey, no run length ball on the stumps, defended to the off side

Vinay to Bailey, OUT short ball on the stumps and Bailey doesn't last long. He pulls that one, but not very well. The mistimed stroke goes straight to the man at deep square leg. Second wicket of the over, and it could be a match-changing one for India
Vinay to Finch, 2 runs fullish on the stumps, this is turned away into the leg side, and the batsmen take two
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run fullish on the stumps, straightening, turned into the leg side for a single
Jadeja to Finch, no run backs away slightly and tries to hit that one through the off side, but can't beat the field
Jadeja to Finch, no run backs away again, but Jadeja follows him and yorks him, preventing a big shot
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run full and flat outside off stump, driven aerially to long on
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run wide and slightly short, Maxwell chops it in front of square to the sweeper on the off side
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run shorter this time, still wide. Cut away to the square sweeper again, on the off side
Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs and he's immediately punished. Goes well wide of leg stump from around the wicket, Finch helps it on its way past fine leg
Ashwin to Finch, 2 wide way wide down the leg side, not even Dhoni can collect
Ashwin to Maxwell, SIX runs over the wicket now, and the result is even worse. Fullish on off stump, Maxwell gets a hold of that and deposits it in the stand behind wide long on
Ashwin to Maxwell, SIX runs straighter but the result is the same, slog swept powerfully over cow corner. This one's even bigger
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run a breather for Ashwin, flatter faster, pitching on a length, Maxwell can't get that beyond the bowler
Ashwin to Maxwell, SIX runs worst ball of the over, and that's saying something. Thigh-high full toss on off stump, Maxwell eats this up. Launched over cow corner again
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run
Kohli to Finch, 2 runs length ball on the stumps, batsman bludgeons that to long on. Oh and an overthrow gives an extra run.
Kohli to Finch, 1 run fullish and on the stumps, driven hard wide of long on
Kohli to Maxwell, no run length on the stumps, pushed into the off side
Kohli to Maxwell, SIX runs it keeps raining sixes, and it's in that cow corner area again. Shortish on the stumps, and Maxwell slams that just over the deep midwicket boundary for another biggie
Kohli to Maxwell, 1 run driven down the ground to long off
Kohli to Finch, no run on the stumps, driven into the infield
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run a big shot on the off side from Maxwell, but Jadeja turns it away from the bat and he misses
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run makes room and tries to force it through the off side, but Jadeja yorks him and he can't do much with it

Jadeja to Maxwell, OUT he's gone now. Maxwell was aiming for yet another six, but Jadeja does him in the flight, and he mistimes this to Ishant Sharma at long on, who takes it just inside the rope, I think. Umpires check it and replays show that Sharma didn't touch the boundary. Good catch, and a decent ball from Jadeja. Took the bottom edge I think,
Jadeja to Finch, no run on the stumps and defended back to the bowler
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run pitched wider from Jadeja, Finch frees his arms and hits it to long off
Jadeja to Haddin, FOUR runs length ball outside off stump, sliding on. Haddin gets off the mark by opening the face and gliding it past slip
Kohli to Finch, FOUR runs what a shot. Finch makes room , and that's another boundary. Full and on the stumps, carved powerfully over cover for four
Kohli to Finch, 1 run closer into the stumps, that length ball is pulled away aerially towards deep mid wicket, where it drops well safe
Kohli to Haddin, 1 run full and on the stumps, turned away into the legside outfield
Kohli to Finch, FOUR runs Finch is playing some innings here, but that's poor bowling as well. Kohli strays a length ball onto the pads, Finch swivels, gets it past short fine leg and to the fence
Kohli to Finch, 1 run backs away and drives a full ball down the ground
Kohli to Haddin, 2 wide short wide ball down the leg side, Dhoni can't collect
Kohli to Finch, 1 run length ball straightening on off stump, turned into the legside again and it's collected at wide long on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs shortish, outside off stump, cut away to the square sweeper on the off side
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run short of a length on off stump, cut away again, but this time third man comes around to collect

Bhuvneshwar to Haddin, OUT short, wide and out. That deserved to go the boundary, but instead it ends in the wicketkeeper's gloves. Might have moved slightly off the seam, but it wasn't much. Haddin cuts at it, and gets a top edge to the keeper
Bhuvneshwar to Henriques, 1 run short again, but closer to the stumps, Henriques cuts but gets a bottom edge onto the pitch

Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs short of a length and that's some placement! Finch muscles that ball onto the leg side, and long on and midwicket almost bump into each other on the fence as it dissects them perfectly
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run fullish ball pushed into the offside infield
Jadeja to Henriques, no run full ball straightening on the stumps, Henriques defends
Jadeja to Henriques, 2 runs shorter and straightening on middle this time, turned away for a well run two
Jadeja to Henriques, 1 run wider and shorter, cut to the cover sweeper who runs around to cut it off
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run low full toss on the stumps, Finch drives it to long on
Jadeja to Henriques, 1 run full on the stumps, straightening. Henriques comes forward and hits it toward long on, where there is a gap
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run full on the stumps, hit through the off side for a single
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs full on the stumps and Finch has played that inside-out shot so well today. Gets low, and carves it over cover again, right in between the two fielders
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs and a poor ball follows. Full toss on the pads, Finch launches that straight-ish on the leg side. Splits long on and midwicket again
Sharma to Finch, 1 run full on the pads, driven to long on
Sharma to Henriques, 1 run slower ball, short and wide. Henriques waits for it and deflects it behind square on the off side for a single

Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs short of a length, and a little wide. Finch is just preying on anything even slightly off line. Cuts that powerfully, cover sweeper runs around and dives, but can only help it onto the boundary
Sharma to Finch, 1 run length outside off stump, driven to that deep cover man again, who does enough to prevent two
Vinay to Finch, 1 run slower ball, fullish on off stump, Finch has a big swing, but mistimes it. Goes along the ground to wide mid on
Vinay to Henriques, 1 run length ball outside off stump, driven to long off

Vinay to Finch, OUT he's got him. Can you believe it's off a knee-high full toss? That's floated up to Finch, who misjudges the pace, and is too early on the shot. He gets an under-edge and hits it straight back to the bowler, who seems to hurt his finger as he holds on. End of a very good innings.
Vinay to Coulter-Nile, 1 run slower ball on the stumps, turned square on the leg side for a single
Vinay to Henriques, 1 run full and wide, driven to deep cover who fields it smartly and keeps it to one run
Vinay to Coulter-Nile, no run slower ball, legcutter I think, straightening on middle stump. Batsman backs away slightly and chops it straight to point.
Bhuvneshwar to Henriques, no run short ball outside off stump, batsman has a big swing but misses
Bhuvneshwar to Henriques, FOUR runs length ball outside off stump, and that's played beautifully late. Just opens the face and third man dives, but it's too fine for him
Bhuvneshwar to Henriques, no run fuller and closer to the stumps, tries to open the face again but misses
Bhuvneshwar to Henriques, OUT and another slower ball does the trick. Shortish one, outside off stump. Henriques tries to pull but again, is too early and a leading edge balloons to point
Bhuvneshwar to Coulter-Nile, 1 run fullish ball, hit along the ground to cover and the batsmen scamper through
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run slower leg cutter again, straightening just outside off stump, Faulkner opens the face and gets one behind square
Vinay to Faulkner, 1 run length ball on off stump, pushed square into the offside infield, where there is a gap
Vinay to Coulter-Nile, 1 run full on off stump, driven to long off
Vinay to Faulkner, 1 run slower ball short and outside off stump, cut away to third man without much power
Vinay to Coulter-Nile, FOUR runs full wide, and Coulter-Nile goes down on one knee to square drive that past backward point and to the fence. Good shot
Vinay to Coulter-Nile, no run wide-ish yorker again, Coulter-Nile chops down on it but misses

Vinay to Coulter-Nile, 1 run length ball, slower one on the pads, N C-N tries to swivel pull that away, but has the timing completely wrong. Ball strikes him on the thigh-pad and they run through for a leg bye
Sharma to Coulter-Nile, no run short ball just outside off stump, batsman aims a big baseball shot but misses
Sharma to Coulter-Nile, 2 runs full and a little wide, Coulter-Nile tries to carve that high over the off side, but mistimes it. Clears the infield though and a fielder runs back to collect
Sharma to Coulter-Nile, 1 run full and wide again, driven along the ground to the offside sweeper this time
Sharma to Faulkner, 1 run short of a length outiside off stump, Faulkner stands tall and swats that cross-batted on the off side, but a diving extra-cover allows only one
Sharma to Coulter-Nile, 1 run full and slightly wide, driven straight to Raina at extra-cover again

Sharma to Faulkner, SIX runs and they get to 200 with a big one off the last ball. Poor ball from Ishant. It was full on the stumps and right in the slot. Faulkner just swings big and connects well enough to clear the boundary at wide mid-on.

Australia were heading for 220 or more at one stage, but although India managed to rein them in slightly, after Finch's dismissal, thy are still chasing plenty. That big bad top order has to live up to its reputation here.
We'll be back with the chase in a bit.
Rohit Sharma and Shikhar Dhawan are in the middle, all set for the second innings

Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run how did that miss the stumps? What a ball to start with. Angled in, pitching on off, and seaming away, Rohit Sharma had no idea about that one. Straight past him to the keeper
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run seaming away on a length again, Rohit's prod can't connect
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run lovely shape from Watson, but this one is too wide to cause any damage. Swinging in the air then seaming away from Sharma
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide saw the swing and got a little overexcited. Angles this way too far down the leg side, and though there was some swing, that's a good-sized wide
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run swinging out to pitch on off stump and straightening, Sharma comes forward to defend
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run swinging away again, but this is wider and short of a length, Rohit opens the face and runs it to third man
Watson to S Dhawan, no run angled across, and ends up slightly wide. Dhawan cuts that good length ball straight to point
McKay to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs lovely pick-up shot, but that was a poor ball to start. Fullish delivery on leg stump, Sharma flicks that off his pads high over backward square leg for four
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish ball outside the off stump, cut away late to third man
McKay to S Dhawan, 2 runs that's on the pads as well, but Dhawan hit it much straighter than Sharma, lofting it over the infield to deep midwicket
McKay to S Dhawan, 1 run drops a few metres short of third man. That was full and slightly wide, Dhawan advances and gets under it, carving it high, but it lands safe
McKay to Raina, 2 runs fullish outside off stump, Raina lifts that square over the off side and third man has some work to do. Cuts it off just inside the fence.
Watson to S Dhawan, 1 run short of a length ball, angled across. Dhawan cuts it aerially to third man, who takes it on the bounce
Watson to Raina, no run short ball wide of off stump, Raina plays at it but misses
Watson to Raina, 1 run short of a length just outside off stump, driven down the ground on the up
Watson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs off line that time, and Dhawan gets a glove on it to get it past a diving Haddin. Short ball, chest, high, but on the legside, and that's an easy boundary
Watson to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball on the stumps, turned into the leg side and into a gap
Watson to Raina, FOUR runs strays on the legs again, and is punished once more. Raina gets low and flicks it in the air, behind square, well away from any fielders

McKay to S Dhawan, FOUR runs length ball, quite wide and flayed through the offside by an advancing Dhawan. He shuffled forward and had enough room to free his arms, just beats the mid-on fielder to the fence

McKay to S Dhawan, FOUR runs that's struck even harder, and through the air this time. Comes down the pitch and turns a length ball into a full one. Opens his face on the drive and sends it above cover for cour,
McKay to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball on the stumps, he's happy to drop that onto the leg side and take a quick single

McKay to Raina, FOUR runs length ball on middle stump, but that wristily carved away with remarkable power by Raina. He backed away, but he was still cramped for room by the ball angling in, somehow times it well enough to beat the cover fielder and run to the fence
McKay to Raina, 1 run length ball outside off stump, opens the face and gets it towards third man
McKay to S Dhawan, no run length ball on off stump, Dhawan gets it on the inside half of the bat and there's no run
Faulkner to Raina, no run full, just outside off stump. Raina goes for a big swing but misses
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run fullish and on the pads, turned away to the deep square leg
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball outside off stump, driven through the gap in the offside infield to deep cover
Faulkner to Raina, 1 leg bye this is straying well onto the pads, Raina probably should have got it to the fine leg fence, but misses with a big sweep, hit his pad and they run through
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan's down the track again, and he drives that straight to extra cover, but they can still run one
Faulkner to Raina, 1 leg bye full on middle stump, clipped away to the on side
Coulter-Nile to Raina, no run length ball on the stumps, batsman backs away and opens the face on a drive, but it's straight to the fielder.
Coulter-Nile to Raina, SIX runs poor line and punished. Short ball on leg stump, Raina steps forward and pulls, and that goes over fine leg after having taken the top half of the bat.
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run full toss on middle stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run shortish ball on the stumps, Kohli defends that to the leg side
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 2 runs shortish ball outside the off side, slower one I think, Kohli pulls that well in front of square and the leg side sweeper runs around to stop it
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, wide of the stumps, Dhawan advances and cuts that to deep point
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run full and outside off stump, clipped away wristily to the man on the legside fence
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run slower ball, full and on middle, Dhawan's down the track again and driving that to deep cover
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run full ball on the stumps, driven down the ground to long on
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run slower ball again, fullish and on the stumps, knocked down into the legside infield where there is a run to be had
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run full toss outside off stump, hit to long on for a single

Henriques to Kohli, FOUR runs good shot first up from Kohli, not much wrong with the ball. Batsman advances and hits the length ball on off stump powerfully back past the bowler and to the straight fence
Henriques to Kohli, no run length outside off stump,chopped into the pitch and there's no run
Henriques to Kohli, 2 runs shortish on off stump, pulled well in front of square again and the deep midwicket runs around to keep it to two
Henriques to Kohli, FOUR runs backs away and plays that wonderfully late. Beats a diving short-third man, who dives in vain
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run length ball on the stumps hit into the legside infield for a single
Henriques to S Dhawan, FOUR runs short and wide, cut powerfully and the diving deep point fielder can't cut it off. Poor ball, and it was hit hard enough to beat a packed offside field.
Doherty to Kohli, 1 wide sends the first one wide down the leg side, good collection by the keeper
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run tosses it up and straightens it on off stump, the batsman drives to deep cover
Doherty to S Dhawan, FOUR runs pitched wide of off stump and straightening, but not enough. Dhawan rocks back and cuts that short ball in between point and short third man, all the way to the fence

Doherty to S Dhawan, OUT he's been coming down the wicket so often, maybe Doherty thought this would just be a matter of time. Dhawan bounds down the pitch again and Doherty pitches it short and wide again. If Dhawan had stayed on the crease, he could have cut this one away too. Maybe he thought Doherty would over-correct and bowl the full delivery. Either way, he'
Doherty to Yuvraj, 1 run fullish outside off stump, driven to long off
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run full on the pads, Kohli just turns this away to deep midwicket
Doherty to Yuvraj, 1 run fullish outside off stump again, and straightening. Yuvi opens the face and gets it past the keeper
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 1 run short ball, chest-high, on off stump. Yuvraj climbs to defend that onto the pitch and they scamper through
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run short of a length on off stump, Kohli runs it to third man
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 1 run length ball on middle stump, turned tidily around the corner by Yuvraj, considered two, but stayed with the one
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full and outside the stumps, driven right into the ground by Kohli. Cover cleans up
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run length ball outside off stump, Kohli shuffles across and drops that into the big gap in the legside infield

Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, FOUR runs full, on the stumps, and that's Yuvraj's first boundary. Picks that up effortlessly off his toes and sends it over midwicket and to the fence. All timing in that shot.

Doherty to Kohli, SIX runs starts the over with a big hit, whacks that over long-off, connects superbly and that's taken beyond the boundary quite well by someone possibly from the India support staff
Doherty to Kohli, 2 runs worked in front of square leg for a couple, India move to 99
Doherty to Kohli, no run short of length ball on off stump, chopped off the back foot towards cover, dot ball
Doherty to Kohli, no run length ball spinning just a bit away towards off, pushed off the front foot
Doherty to Kohli, no run fired this flat as usual, keeps it on off stump, another dot ball, big shot next?
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run nope, the final ball is clipped towards square leg for a single, India's 100 comes up, Doherty does well after that first-ball six

McKay to Yuvraj, FOUR runs slower one from McKay, Yuvraj had to wait for that to arrive, was initially looking to power that through the off, instead changes to a cute dab past the dab, a bit of an edge but wide past the keeper
McKay to Yuvraj, 1 run eases this behind point for a single, chants of 'Dhoni, Dhoni' around the ground
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run short of length ball on middle and off, clipped towards square leg for a single, Dhoni gets his first run
McKay to Yuvraj, no run fuller and angling into off stump, pushed out in front of point
McKay to Yuvraj, no run wild from Yuvraj, a slower one that doesn't rise much, Yuvraj's attempt to swipe that through the leg side meets nothing but air
Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs short of length ball on the pads, nudged towards deep backward square leg, Dhoni zips through for two
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs short of length ball outside off, immense power from Dhoni, absolutely rips that over extra cover off the back foot for four, flat-batted muscular hit
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run similar length, closer to off stump, poked towards cover for a single
Watson to Yuvraj, no run keeps it on the shorter side, Yuvraj goes for the pull but once again he doesn't connect
Watson to Yuvraj, 1 run short of length ball on legstump, Yuvraj swings it towards deep backward square leg, doesn't hit it as well as he wanted

Watson to Dhoni, 1 run short of length again from Watson, Dhoni turns that towards square leg and charges through for the single, intending to come back for the second, even he isn't quick enough for that though, settles for one
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run just outside off, dabbed towards third man for a single
McKay to Yuvraj, SIX runs a touch short, slower one from McKay, Yuvraj backs himself to clear the man in the deep and the midwicket rope, he does easily, that's six

McKay to Yuvraj, SIX runs that was almost perfect from Watson, what an outstanding effort after Yuvraj flicks a length ball towards the deep square leg boundary, Watson had to jump to get a hold of that at the rope, does well to catch, then he throws the ball up as he realises he is going to cross the rope, he comes back in to pouch the ball once more but his leg
McKay to Yuvraj, FOUR runs on the pads, that is helped along towards fine leg for four, India staying in this chase
McKay to Yuvraj, 1 run on legstump again, worked towards fine leg for a single
McKay to Dhoni, no run pushes this to the off side to end the over, dot ball
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, no run a high full toss outside off, lucky to get away with that one, Yuvraj can only slap that towards point
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, FOUR runs beautiful from Yuvraj, that was a length ball that is lofted effortlessly over extra cover, stylishly four from Yuvraj
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 1 wide full and down the leg side, that is called a wide
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, FOUR runs slower one, full from Coulter-Nile, Yuvraj sees the mid-off is in the circle and launches this over him, another boundary for Yuvraj
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 2 runs low full toss just outside off, sends that towards sweeper cover for a couple
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 1 run length ball outside off, driven towards long-off for a single
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run nearly sneaked under the bat, that was full and outside off, Dhoni looked to jam that towards the off side, gets a single for his efforts

Doherty to Dhoni, no run both batsmen had close calls there, Dhoni nearly chipping a return catch to the bowler, who then fired the ball at the non-striker's stumps to try get Yuvraj run-out, he misses the stumps but the ball thuds into the umpire
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run single towards mid-on
Doherty to Yuvraj, 1 run a cross-batted swipe towards long-on for a single, not the most aesthetic of strokes
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 leg bye fired in quick, on the pads, looking to work that to the leg side, can't connect, good over so far

Doherty to Yuvraj, FOUR runs too short from Doherty, in this mood Yuvraj isn't going to miss out, fiercely puts that away to the wide long-on boundary for four, two fielders could only watch it race by
Doherty to Yuvraj, no run pushed back towards the bowler to end the over
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run Faulkner starts the over with a full and wide delivery, Dhoni reaches out and sends that in front of point, Bailey does well at point to cut that off
Faulkner to Yuvraj, 1 leg bye pitched up and heading for the pads, Yuvraj looking to whip that to the leg side, he misses, hits the pads but that would have missed leg stump
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run a low full toss on off stump, superb delivery that, pushed out towards long-off for a single

Faulkner to Yuvraj, SIX runs length ball on middle and off, sensational hit from Yuvraj Singh, a straight six, hardly seemed to be putting any effort in that, the ball sails towards the sightscreen and that's a 25-ball half-century for Yuvraj

Faulkner to Yuvraj, SIX runs six more, length ball angling in towards the pads, Yuvraj can't quite free his arms but still manages to get enough power as he swipes that over deep square leg for six more, 59 off 26 now, what a comeback this is from Yuvraj
Faulkner to Yuvraj, 5 wide oh dear, in three balls this game might have got out of Australia's hands, this was a wild wide down the leg side, five free runs, Faulkner can't believe it
Faulkner to Yuvraj, no run much better this time from Faulkner, keeps it full and just outside off, squeezed to the off side by Yuvraj, dot ball

Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni's been mainly getting singles and twos but India still keeping up with the asking rate, showing up how well Yuvraj has done, this time Dhoni pushes a full ball outside off towards point for a single
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, no run length ball outside off, steered towards backward point, Dhoni screams 'No, no, no' as the batsmen think of a single
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 1 wide full and wide, too wide according to the umpire, right call from the ump too
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, FOUR runs four more, a length ball well outside off, Yuvraj reaches out for that one and lofts it over cover, places it wide of sweeper cover as well, no stopping Yuvi
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, 1 run full ball just outside off, eased towards long-off for a single
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run full toss, low and on middle stump, another single for Dhoni, who taps the ball towards long-off
Coulter-Nile to Yuvraj, SIX runs six more, Yuvraj is walking this, this game is dead and buried, a full toss on the pads, nonchalantly put away over midwicket for another six
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run length ball on middle, Dhoni clips this towards square leg for one more, Dhoni happy to let yuvraj go slam-bang
Faulkner to Yuvraj, FOUR runs it's only boundaries from Yuvraj, this was a low full toss outside off, calmly steers it behind backward point for four more
Faulkner to Yuvraj, 1 run full and on the pads, clipped towards deep midwicket for one more
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run good delivery from Faulkner, full ball on middle, worked towards midwicket for a single
Faulkner to Yuvraj, 1 run full toss well outside off, Yuvraj leans across and jabs the ball behind point
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run low full toss on off stump, worked towards point by Dhoni
Watson to Yuvraj, 1 run starts with a short ball that is pulled away towards deep square leg for a single
Watson to Dhoni, no run Dhoni looks to finish the game with a big six over long-off, it was in the slot outside off, Dhoni doesn't connect though

Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs all those field changes doesn't matter, not to Dhoni in the final over, this man has tremendous power, it was a terrific delivery, nearly yorker length, outside off, Dhoni just powers that to the cover boundary for four
Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs full toss well outside off, through to sweeper cover, that will do, fireworks in Rajkot (literally) as India win with two balls to spare

Thanks everyone for tuning in on what has been an emotional day for Indian cricket, with its biggest name announcing his retirement and one of its biggest limited-overs stars returning with a terrific innings. See you all in the first ODI, ta ta.
Presentation ceremony coming up.

Dhoni put the finishing touches in the last over, but this was all about Yuvraj Singh. Comeback game, and he has shown what he's capable off, lifting the spirits of Indian fans (at least a bit) after this afternoon's big announcement.
India won by 6 wickets (with 2 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Yuvraj Singh, INDIA
